title: VR版本的Minecraft登陆Oculus Rift
author: Wolverine
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2016-8-26 17:30 编辑 





Screenshot·.png (159.73 KB, 下载次数: 3)

2016-8-16 06:30 上传





@Minecraft：
Is YOUR FACE ready for VR? Coz Minecraft now works on Oculus Rift! It's a free update, too! 
准备好使用VR版本了吗？Oculus Rift现在可以使用Minecraft了！免费升级哟！

http://mojang.com/2016/08/minecr ... -oculus-rift-today/

replies.txt_content: vr看就就头晕啊，我看我是没戏了

replies.txt_content: VR确实好，可是要玩VR要高价钱~
